byline.contributor: Jennifer Steinhauer and Carl Hulse contributed reporting from Washington.

snippet: A Chinese official said that a Senate bill, which threatens higher tariffs on some imports if China is found to be manipulating its currency, violated the rules of the World Trade Organization.
lead_paragraph: A Chinese official said that a Senate bill, which threatens higher tariffs on some imports if China is found to be manipulating its currency, violated the rules of the World Trade Organization.

headline.main: U.S. Senate’s Bill on Tariffs Angers China
headline.print_headline: U.S. Senate’s Bill on Tariffs Angers China
headline.seo: China Criticizes U.S. Senate’s Currency Manipulation Bill
